name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lamborghini Revuelto: Bold Power in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the Lamborghini Revuelto with bold visuals and seamless shortcuts in this dynamic theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Experience the unmatched style and performance of the Lamborghini Revuelto with stunning visuals.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek and modern interface inspired by the cutting-edge design of the Revuelto.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date at a glance with precision.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate instantly to your favorite websites with streamlined ease.
🎮 Play Games: Access thrilling games directly from your shortcuts for an engaging experience.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
🚀 More Extension: Add high-performance features to enhance your browsing experience with Lamborghini elegance.
